hero.headline: Anthropic and Snowflake Ink $200M Partnership: Claude Models Reach 12,600 Enterprise Customers
hero.summary: Anthropic announced a significant expansion of their strategic partnership with Snowflake, a multi-year $200 million agreement that makes Claude models available across the Snowflake platform to over 12,600 global customers via Amazon Bedrock, Google Cloud Vertex AI, and Microsoft Azure.
hero.whyItMatters: This is one of the largest enterprise AI deals of 2025. With Claude Code already holding 54% of the AI coding market share and this partnership bringing Claude to Snowflake's data cloud infrastructure, Anthropic is cementing its position as the enterprise AI leader. Developers building on Snowflake now have native access to Claude's capabilities.

topStories.title: Claude Code Coming to Slack: Delegate Coding Tasks from Chat Threads
topStories.summary: Anthropic is launching Claude Code in Slack beta, allowing developers to tag @Claude to spin up coding sessions directly from bug reports and feature requests in chat threads. Claude analyzes context, works in the right repo, and posts progress updates.

topStories.title: OpenAI Launches Agent Skills in Codex: Reusable Instruction Bundles
topStories.summary: Codex now supports agent skills—reusable bundles of instructions with optional scripts that help complete specific tasks. Skills work in CLI and IDE extensions, can be invoked explicitly with $skill-name or auto-selected based on prompts.

topStories.title: Continuous-Claude: Context Management via Hooks and Ledgers
topStories.summary: A new GitHub project trending with 571 score implements context management for Claude Code using hooks to maintain state via ledgers and handoffs. Enables MCP execution without context pollution for long-running sessions.

topStories.title: byLLM Framework: Add AI to Software with Single Line of Code
topStories.summary: The byLLM open-source framework eliminates manual prompt engineering by letting developers integrate LLMs directly into software. Studies show developers complete tasks 3x faster and write 45% fewer lines of code.

trendingRepos.name: parcadei/Continuous-Claude
trendingRepos.description: Context management for Claude Code using hooks. Maintains state via ledgers and handoffs, enabling MCP execution without context pollution.

trendingRepos.description: Extensible AI agent from Block that installs packages, executes commands, edits files, and runs tests—powered by any LLM of your choice.

trendingSkills.description: Guide for TypeScript project organization including export syntax, file structure, and code organization best practices.

trendingSkills.name: Smart Docs Updater
trendingSkills.description: Consolidates multiple work changes into unified documentation entries rather than fragmented updates for cleaner changelogs.

trendingSkills.name: Research Strategy
trendingSkills.description: Conducts systematic research with confidence scoring and source validation for technology decisions and architectural choices.

trendingSkills.name: DDD Architect
trendingSkills.description: Ensures code follows Domain-Driven Design architecture and DAL separation principles for enterprise-grade applications.

newMcpServers.name: mcp-server-bitbucket
newMcpServers.description: Comprehensive Bitbucket API integration for MCP clients. 58 tools covering repository management, pull requests, pipelines, and branch operations.

newMcpServers.name: design_patterns_mcp
newMcpServers.description: Intelligent MCP server providing design pattern recommendations using semantic search across 661 patterns. Natural language interface for architectural decisions.

newMcpServers.name: render-mcp-server
newMcpServers.description: Official Render MCP server for spinning up services, running database queries, and debugging with direct access to service metrics and logs.

newMcpServers.name: buildkite-mcp-server
newMcpServers.description: Official Buildkite MCP server that can create pipelines, diagnose and fix failures, trigger builds, and monitor job queues conversationally.

notableHooks.name: Claude Code Hooks Mastery
notableHooks.description: Comprehensive hooks repository teaching all 8 Claude Code lifecycle events including deterministic and non-deterministic control over agent behavior. Includes sub-agent and meta-agent patterns.

notableHooks.name: Block-at-Submit Test Guard
notableHooks.description: Enterprise hook pattern that blocks git commits unless tests pass. Forces Claude into a test-and-fix loop until the build is green—deterministic quality control.

notableHooks.name: Environment Variable Persistence
notableHooks.description: Injects environment variables at session start using CLAUDE_ENV_FILE. Perfect for setting API keys, NODE_ENV, or project-specific configuration automatically.

tuiTools.name: yazi
tuiTools.description: Blazing fast terminal file manager written in Rust based on async I/O. Beautiful UI with image preview and plugin system.

tuiTools.name: bottom
tuiTools.description: A customizable graphical process/system monitor for the terminal. Highly configurable resource monitoring with beautiful charts.

tuiTools.name: k9s
tuiTools.description: TUI for managing Kubernetes clusters. Navigate resources, view logs, exec into pods—all with keyboard-driven efficiency.

tuiTools.name: Textual
tuiTools.description: TUI framework for Python inspired by modern web development. Build sophisticated terminal UIs that also run in browsers.

highlights: LSP (Language Server Protocol) tool for go-to-definition, find references, and hover documentation
Terminal setup support for Kitty, Alacritty, Zed, and Warp terminals
Ctrl+t shortcut in /theme to toggle syntax highlighting on/off
Gemini 3 Flash support with Pro-grade coding at lower latency
Holiday snowfall animation in theme settings
Granular shell command allowlisting in policy engine
Most advanced agentic coding model with improved long-horizon work via context compaction
Agent skills: reusable instruction bundles for CLI and IDE extensions
Stronger cybersecurity capabilities—helped discover React Server Components vulnerability

notableQuotes.quote: Our new partnership means that tens of thousands of Accenture developers will be using Claude Code, making this our largest ever deployment.
notableQuotes.author: Dario Amodei

notableQuotes.quote: Context engineering is replacing prompt engineering as the new frontier of control. It's not about clever wording anymore—it's about designing environments where AI can think with depth, consistency, and purpose.
notableQuotes.author: KDnuggets Research

notableQuotes.quote: This was supposed to be the year AI replaced developers, but it wasn't even close. What actually happened is developers became orchestrators of AI agents.
notableQuotes.author: Zach Lloyd

prompt: Generated via /generate-news slash command. Claude fetches data from 9 sources in parallel (aggregated RSS feed, 7 web searches, GitHub trending via trotd, SkillsMP feed, Claude Code/Gemini CLI/Codex changelogs, Docker MCP catalog via mcp-find, YouTube trending API, Claude Code hooks docs, awesome-tuis list), deduplicates against the past 14 days of digests, then curates into structured JSON.
